title: BHARun
description: A single bottom hole assembly run. This represents the period beginning when the BHA enters the hole until it leaves the hole.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description:
Unique identifier for the wellbore.  This uniquely represents
				the wellbore referenced by the (possibly non-unique) nameWellbore.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Human recognizable context for the run.

TubularID.title: Tubular ID
TubularID.description:
This represents a foreign key to the tubular (assembly) 
					that was utilized in this run.

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section ID
HoleSectionID.description: This represents a foreign key to the Hole Section in which this BHA Run was performed.

ActivityStartDateTime.title: Activity Start Date-Time
ActivityStartDateTime.description: Date and time that activities started.

ActivityStopDateTime.title: Activity Stop Date-Time
ActivityStopDateTime.description: Date and time that activities stopped.

DrillingStartDateTime.title: Drilling Start Date-Time
DrillingStartDateTime.description: Start on bottom - date and time.

DrillingStopDateTime.title: Drilling Stop Date-Time
DrillingStopDateTime.description: Start off bottom - date and time.

StatusBhaID.title: Status Bha
StatusBhaID.x-osdu-existing-standard: Proposed reference values: final, progress, plan, unknown

RunParameterPlans.title: Run Parameter Plans
RunParameterPlans.description: Identifiers of the associated run parameter plans.

items.title: Run Parameter Plan
items.description: Operating parameters of a drill string run

RunStartHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Run-Start Hole Measured-Depth
RunStartHoleMeasuredDepth.description: The start measured depth of the hole section at the start of the run. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

RunEndHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Run-End Hole Measured-Depth
RunEndHoleMeasuredDepth.description: The end measured depth of the hole section at the end of the run. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

OperationParameterPlan.title: Operation Parameter Plan
OperationParameterPlan.description: A series of operating parameters observed during the run

RealizationStrategy.title: Realization Strategy
RealizationStrategy.description: The realization strategy utilized in this series of operation parameters

TorqueOnBottomGroup.title: Torque On Bottom Group
TorqueOnBottomGroup.description: A group of parameters that refer to Torque on Bottom

MaximumTorqueOnBottom.title: Maximum Torque On Bottom
MaximumTorqueOnBottom.description: The planned maximum torque while on bottom

Point.title: Point
Point.description: the pair of points associated with the parameter group.

items.title: Point
items.description: The definition of the point

ObservationMeasuredDepth.title: M D
ObservationMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth at which the measurement was observed. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The value observed at the measured depth

ValueUnitID.title: Value Unit ID
ValueUnitID.description: Unit of measure of the Value value

PointsSources.title: Points Sources
PointsSources.description: The source indicator associated with this point.

items.title: Points Source
items.description: The definition of the points used as a source for each individual critical point, resulting from parameters set or observed during a BHA run

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the Source Indicator Type. For example Manual Input

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The value at that point.

ValueUnitID.title: Value Unit I D
ValueUnitID.description: Unit of measure of the Value value

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Description associated with the source indicator type.

MinimumTorqueOnBottom.title: Minimum Torque On Bottom
MinimumTorqueOnBottom.description: The planned minimum torque while on bottom

RunComment.title: Run Comment
RunComment.description: Free text allowing any comment associated to the run

MeasuredDepthRunStart.title: Measured Depth Run Start
MeasuredDepthRunStart.description: Measured depth at run start. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

MeasuredDepthRunStop.title: Measured Depth Run Stop
MeasuredDepthRunStop.description: Measured depth at run stop. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

WtAboveJar.title: Weight Above Jar
WtAboveJar.description: Desired weight to be placed above the Jar - to optimize its efficiency

WtBelowJar.title: Weight Below Jar
WtBelowJar.description: Desired weight to be placed blow the Jar - to optimize its efficiency

DrillingParams.title: Drilling Parameters
DrillingParams.description: The parameters that were used during the BHA run

items.title: Drilling Parameters
items.description: The bottomhole assembly drilling parameters schema, which contains statistical and calculated operations data for the run, related to depths, activities, temperature, pressure, flow rates, torque, etc.

BitRunTIme.title: Operating Time Bit
BitRunTIme.description:
Operating time spent by bit for run.

BUSINESS RULE: When reporting an actual as opposed to design, this is required.

RunStartHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Measured Depth Hole Start
RunStartHoleMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at start of the run.

RunEndHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Measured Depth Hole Stop
RunEndHoleMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at the end of the run.

HookloadUp.title: Hookload Up
HookloadUp.description: Hookload when the string is moving up.

HookloadDown.title: Hookload Down
HookloadDown.description: Hookload when the string is moving down.

WeightAboveJar.title: Weight Above Jar
WeightAboveJar.description: Weight of the string above the jars.

WeightBelowJar.title: Weight Below Jar
WeightBelowJar.description: Weight  of the string below the jars.

TimeHolding.title: Cumulative Time Hold
TimeHolding.description: Time spent on hold from start of bit run.

TimeSteering.title: Cumulative Time Steering
TimeSteering.description: Time spent steering from start of bit run.

TimeDrillingRotating.title: Cumulative Time Drill Rotating
TimeDrillingRotating.description: Time spent rotary drilling from start of bit run.

TimeDrillingSliding.title: Cumulative Time Drill Sliding
TimeDrillingSliding.description: Time spent slide drilling from start of bit run.

TimeCirculating.title: Cumulative Time Circulating
TimeCirculating.description: Time spent circulating from start of bit run.

TimeReaming.title: Cumulative Time Reaming
TimeReaming.description: Time spent reaming from start of bit run.

DistanceHolding.title: Distance Holding
DistanceHolding.description: Distance covered while holding angle with a steerable drilling assembly.

DistanceSteering.title: Distance Steering
DistanceSteering.description: Distance covered while actively steering with a steerable drilling assembly.

AverageRpm.title: Rpm Average
AverageRpm.description: Average surface turn rate (commonly in rpm) through Interval.

AverageRpmDownhole.title: Rpm Average Downhole
AverageRpmDownhole.description: Average turn rate (commonly in rpm) downhole.

AverageROP.title: Rop Average
AverageROP.description: Average rate of penetration through Interval.

MaximumROP.title: Rop Max
MaximumROP.description: Maximum rate of penetration through Interval.

MinimumROP.title: Rop Min
MinimumROP.description: Minimum rate of penetration through Interval.

AverageWOB.title: Wob Average
AverageWOB.description: Surface weight on bit - average through interval.

MaximumMudTemperatureDownhole.title: Maximum Mud Temperature Downhole
MaximumMudTemperatureDownhole.description: Maximum mud temperature downhole during run.

MinimumPumpPressure.title: Minimum Pump Pressure
MinimumPumpPressure.description: The minimum pump pressure used during the run

MaximumPumpPressure.title: Maximum Pump Pressure
MaximumPumpPressure.description: The maximum pump pressure used during the run

AveragePumpPressure.title: Average Pump Pressure
AveragePumpPressure.description: The average pump pressure used during the run

MinimumBitFlowrate.title: Minimum Bit Flowrate
MinimumBitFlowrate.description: The minimum flowrate at the bit during the run

MaximumBitFlowrate.title: Maximum Bit Flowrate
MaximumBitFlowrate.description: The maximum flowrate at the bit during the run

AverageBitFlowrate.title: Average Bit Flowrate
AverageBitFlowrate.description: The average flowrate at the bit during the run

MudClass.title: Mud Class
MudClass.description: The class of the drilling fluid.
